high_descs: Turn to your right towards the sofa
pick the tomato from the sofa
place the tomato in the microwave
anns.task_desc: place the tomato in the microwave to cook

high_descs: turn right and head straight to the sofa
pick up a tomato from sofa
turn around and walk to the microwave oven
open the microwave oven and place tomato into it and close the door
anns.task_desc: placing the tomato into the microwave oven

high_descs: Stand up turn around walk towards the sofa.
Keep the egg on the top of the microwave..
Turn around move towards the microwave.
Keep the tomato on the top of the microwave.
anns.task_desc: Keep the egg on the top of the microwave and keep it on the microwave.
